Title: 089: Using Excel in Data Science and Life-Long Learning
Description:
In this episode of the SuperDataScience Podcast, I chat with the Best Selling Data Science Instructor, Chris Dutton. You will learn about Excel's role in Data Science, get more insights about choosing what to learn in Data Science, and the modeling luck in a baseball hitter's batting average.


If you enjoyed this episode, check out show notes, resources, and more at www.superdatascience.com/89
